name: Starcraft: Reborn
description:
StarCraft: Reborn is a series of custom campaigns designed to revisit the the storyline of the original StarCraft and expansion while making use of all the benefits of StarCraft 2's rendering engine.
Our goal is to create a thrilling mod that allows newcomers to the StarCraft universe to experience everything that made the original games great while also giving veteran players exciting new avenues to explore. By drawing inspiration from the expanded lore introduced in the StarCraft series of books, short stories and comics, there will be something new for everyone.
Features:
\+ Expanded Maps
\+ New Primary Objectives
\+ New Bonus Secondary Objectives
\+ New Characters
\+ New In-Game Cinematics
\+ Classic Units, Abilities, & Tech Trees
\+ Original Music & Voiceovers
Forums: [http://www.starcraftreborn.com/forums]()
author: _ForgeUser4616002
